text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I knew it, this mimics the setting of "Rhodonite"…!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Then I can't go this alone…… I need to gather 
someone to… I need to gather "villagers," or I… won'―

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Noo! We lost them, the fireflies!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Hang on, Taiki…! You never know what comes 
out in the for… est at… nigh—

text_block_list.name: Taiki & Dober
text_block_list.text:
AAAAAAAAAA! 
NOOOOOOO!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: S-sorry to have startled you……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
No, I'm sorry for screaming so loudly… 
I didn't know you were here too, Rob Roy.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Ah, yes! 
I'm, umm… on a bit of a treasure hunt.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Treasure hunt!?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Y-Yes ……! You see, the topography of these campgrounds 
is similar to that of a certain childre―

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
… I mean, umm… movie. 
The grounds and forest here are very similar to those 
appearing in a certain movie…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: What!? Amazing!!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
I-I thought it was a coincidence at first, but when 
I looked it up, I found out that the owner of 
this campground was the writer for it.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
And after actually walking around and checking things 
out, I've become convinced. This place is a challenge to 
the fans, a dreamland, a hidden map……!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
In which case, there is likely to be a "Dreamstone" somewhere, 
a phantastic gemstone that can make wishes come true.…… 
And so, here is…… Umm?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Unbelievable! 
Such adventure right under our feet!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Taiki looks really excited. Well of course, she loves this sort 
of thing. ……Right! What if all of us went on this treasu—)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Ahh, but wouldn't we be a nuisance if we suddenly said 
we wanted to join……? It looks like she came alone, so maybe 
she's the type to prefer her fun in peace and quiet.)

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey! Can we join you in this treasure hunt?! I'm sure more people makes it more exciting!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huh? Hey—

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Of course, please do……! 
This story is about coming together to find treasure after all!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Joining forces? The more the merrier, it is!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. The peculiarities of five villagers unite 
in a search for wish-fulfilling hidden treasure, braving 
dangers for the good of their village.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
They start out disparate, but little by little they grow through 
their journey, and in the end they joined their strengths to 
for their great cause. The final chapter is such a tear-jer—

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
…S-Sorry, I guess that's besides the point……! 
Anyway, traps requiring multiple persons to disarm are 
standard fare in these stories!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I would be very grateful to have your assistance…!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Yahoo! Thank you! 
Five people means…… okay! Let's invite those 2 tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yippee! Treasuretreasure, hunting treasuuure!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: They call me El the Treasure Hunter!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Oh, thank you ……! I can't believe we have a party of five 
to search for the Dreamstone, just like the original……!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (…… What do I do? I went and told a lie……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
("Rhodonite and the Dreamstone" ……! 
I still can't get enough of its detailed setting 
after the many times I read it……!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(―Oh no, I only wanted to verify the terrain and got 
caught up reading again. I need to head to the baths……!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(…… Either way. 
I'm really looking forward to going to the campgrounds……!)

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
S'cuse mee, Rob Roy, do you have a booster? 
I left mine in my room……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
……Eh, ah…… 
B-booster…… as in……?

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
…… Huh? Uhh, like, an initial skincare serum. 
The one you put on before tone-… face lotions, you know?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I see. Is that how it is? 
I'm sorry, I'm not that―

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
I have some! 
Lately I've done a bunch of small short-term jobs～. Here.

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Wha…… This is "Violet", you for real!?

text_block_list.name: Classmate C
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that stuff! I use that too. Did you learn through 
Curren too? I heard using the whole line has great effects. 
Can't do that of course, though.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(…… Wow, everyone is connecting over this. 
All these happy faces… I guess most girls are 
interested in those sorts of things……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (…… I didn't know……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(………… Or rather, I don't really know… much? 
Always glued to my books―)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Maybe that's…… a little embarrassing……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(…… Even though it's really a children's book and not a 
movie… I felt like a movie was more mature, and……!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
(Should I tell them after all? 
But they probably don't really……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
…… Mm, it's fine. 
.……It's fine.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Rob Roy! Come on! Let's go, on a grand adventure!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah…… y-yes!
